Miscellaneous

Useful Web Development Links

  • Jekyll static site generator
  • Andrew Munsell's excellent but slightly dated Jekyll tutorial
  • MathJax docs for putting tex on the web
  • Twitter's Bootstrap for easy web development

Favorite Math Sites

  • Terry Tao's blog
  • Mathblogging.org
  • American Mathematical Society, including Ph.D. + \(\epsilon\)

Useful Apps and Tools

  • Readability for preparing web pages for off-line and smart-phone reading
  • Good Reads for tracking all the books you might someday read
  • mGSD for Getting Things Done using a fully in-browser wiki
  • Math Jax for plugin-free javascript-based math markup on the web
